welcome.title: Fara tafiya da KasaEd! üöÄ
welcome.subtitle: Abokinmu da aminci ne don magana game da lafiya mai zaman kansa da kuma lafiya na iyali. Yi tambaya, samu amsa, kuma nemo tallafi a kowane lokaci, a kowane wuri - duka a harshenka kuma amincinmu ne.

language.title: Za…ìi Harshenka
language.subtitle: Za…ìi harshen da kuka fi so

privacy.title: Sirrinka Yana da Mahimmanci
privacy.point1: Dukkan abubuwan da kuka tambaya ne sirri ne.
privacy.point2: Ba mu tattara sunanka, imel …óin ka, ko lambar wayarka ba.
privacy.point4: Kuna iya share tarihin tattaunawar ku a kowane lokaci.

age.title: Ka…óan Shekara Kake?
age.subtitle: Wannan zai taimaka mana don ba ku bayanin daidai wa…óanda suka dace da shekaranku.

alerts.speechNotSupported: Wannan browser ba ya goyan bayan gane magana. Da fatan za a yi amfani da Chrome, Edge, ko Safari.
alerts.micAccessDenied: An hana shiga microphone. Da fatan za a ba da izini.
alerts.ttsNotSupported: Rubutu-zuwa-magana ba ya goyan bayan wannan browser.

emergency.title: üö® TALLAFI NA GAGI YANA AZAMAN
emergency.message: Na ji ku. Ba ku kada ba. Da fatan za a tuntubi …óayan wa…óannan lambar a yanzu. Suna da koyarwa don taimaka. Kuwa yana da mahimmanci. Tallafi yana nan.

faq1.question: ∆òayyade tsarin kondom ne?
faq1.answer: ∆òayyade tsarin kondom shine kusan 98% idan an yi amfani da su daidai a kowane lokaci. Suna kare masa STI har da HIV. Yi amfani da sabon kondom a kowane aiki na jima'i.

faq2.question: Shin zan iya samun ciki a cikin lokacin addin?
faq2.answer: Ee, amma yana da ∆ôaranci. Sperm na iya rayuwa a cikin jiki har zuwa kwana 5, don haka idan lokacin addin ku na ∆ôaranci, yana yiwuwa. Yi amfani da karewa a gaba-gaba.

faq3.question: Ta yaya zan san da STI?
faq3.answer: ∆òwararrun STI ba su da alamomi. Alamomi masu amfani: sarari mara kyau, cuta, ciwon jini a lokacin shan abin sha, ko kuncin jini. Yi gwaji a gaba-gaba idan kuna aiki da jima'i.

faq4.question: Shin HIV yana da magudi?
faq4.answer: HIV ba shi da magudi, amma yana da shafawa. Antiretroviral therapy (ARVs) yana ba masu HIV damar rayuwa mai tsayi da lafiya. Da shafawa, viral load na iya zama mara ganuwa.

faq5.question: Menene izini?
faq5.answer: Izini shine yarda mai zuwa don shiga a cikin aiki na jima'i. Dole ne a ba shi da kyau, ana iya janyewa a kowane lokaci, kuma shirin aiki ko "∆ôila" ba shi izini ba.

faq6.question: Ina zan sami kondom na kyauta?
faq6.answer: Kondom na kyauta akwai a cibiyar lafiya na gwamnati, kliniki na PPAG, cibiyar masu al∆ôawari, da wasu gidajen NGO a Ghana.

faq7.question: Ta yaya zan sarrafa damuwa?
faq7.answer: Sarrafa damuwa da lafiya ya ha…óa: riyawa a gaba-gaba, barci mai yawa, magana da wani da ka amince, jin ∆ôararrawa, da shiga a wasu abubuwa da ka ke so.

faq8.question: Me zan yi idan na ji damuwa?
faq8.answer: Kira lamba na gaggawa yanzu (Suicide Prevention: 0800234567). Magana da babba, mai shawara, ko mai lafiya. Ba ku kada ba, kuma taimako akwai.

faq9.question: Shin zan iya samun alabin gaggawa ba tare da takardar dokar ba?
faq9.answer: Ee, kowane gaggawa (Postinor-2, Plan B) akwai a sayar da su a apothecaries a Ghana. Yana da amfani a cikin awa 72 bayan shiga ba karewa ba.

faq10.question: Ta yaya zan gwada HIV?
faq10.answer: Gwajin HIV na kyauta akwai a cibiyar Shawarwari da Gwaji (VCT), asibiti na gwamnati, da kliniki na PPAG. Gwajin shi ne sirri.

welcome.title: Lafiya na Zuciyar Ka Yana da Mahimmanci
welcome.text: Kare lafiya na zuciyar ka yana da mahimmanci kamar yadda kake kare lafiya na jiki. Lafiya na zuciyar ka yana shafi dukkan abubuwan da ke rayuwarka, har da lafiya mai zaman kansa, ala∆ôa, da dukkan lafiyar ku.
welcome.whyMatters: Me Yasa Lafiya na Zuciyar Ka Yana da Mahimmanci don Lafiya Mai Zaman Kansa

depression.title: Shaidar Rashin Farin Ciki
depression.info: Shaidar alamar rashin farin ciki da ke ha…óa da yanayin jiki, sha'awa, barci, da ∆ôarfi

anxiety.title: Shaidar Damuwa
anxiety.info: Shaidar damuwa mai zaman kansa da ke ha…óa da damuwa, rashin jin da…ói, da tsoro

assessment.confidentialNote: Dukkan amsoshin ku sirri ne kuma an adana su a na'urar ku

results.title: Sakamakonku
results.disclaimer: Wannan shaidar duba ne, ba shaidar cuta ba. Don duba cikakke, da fatan za a tuntubi mai lafiya na zuciyar ka ko daktarka.

familyPlanning.title: ∆òayyade Iyalan
familyPlanning.text: Yi la'akari da ziyartar kliniki don ∆ôayyade iyali don shawarwari mai zaman kansa.

regularTesting.title: Gwaji na Yau da Yau
regularTesting.text: Yi gwaji don STI kowane watanni 6 idan kuna aiki da jima'i. Gwaji na kyauta akwai a cibiyar VCT.

stayHealthy.title: Ku Je Lafiya
stayHealthy.text: Ci gaba da yin tambayoyi! Gwaji da ∆ôayyade iyali daidai ne don lafiya mai zaman kansa.
